snippet: John A. Catsimatidis, the billionaire Republican mayoral candidate, must confront New York’s relationship with Gristedes, the unloved grocery store for which he is best known.
abstract: John A Catsimatidis, billionaire Republican mayoral candidate, must confront New York’s relationship with Gristedes, unloved grocery store for which he is best known; company has paid millions of dollars to settle lawsuits brought by employees and others (Series: In the Running).
lead_paragraph: John A. Catsimatidis, the billionaire Republican mayoral candidate, must confront New York’s relationship with Gristedes, the unloved grocery store for which he is best known.

headline.print_headline: Candidate With a Store Chain Around His Neck
headline.seo: Catsimatidis Hopes to Make Voters Happier Than Shoppers
headline.main: A Candidate With a Store Chain Around His Neck
